Monserrato Park, virtual tour

Let’s explore some places in the Monserrato Park! Among the many observation points, we have chosen three that will allow us to get to know the colors, the luxuriant nature and the small church built inside; to learn more about the park, you can read the main post. The map Read more…

Nature and Hiking

The Monserrato Garden in Sassari

In the suburbs of Sassari we find the historical park of Monserrato; this is undoubtedly the ideal place for short walks and relaxing in nature. This destination is full of elegant gardens, fountains, small paths and stairways: a continuous discovery of picturesque corners! The southern outskirts of Sassari are surrounded by woods and green areas. Read more…

History and Culture

An old steam locomotive in Sassari

In the district of Latte Dolce, in a square on the outskirts of Sassari, there is a surprising and unexpected monument… It is not an ancient statue, a majestic palace, a curious work of contemporary art… This time, we are faced with an authentic steam locomotive built in the early Read more…

Nature and Hiking

Skies of Sardinia

When we think about Sardina we often imagine the sea or inland places. Yet there is also another treasure that deserves to be discovered, on the clearest nights, by raising your eyes upwards! The island is undoubtedly one of the best Italian regions for observing the skies. Observations and astrophotography Read more…

Virtual walk through the Roman ruins of Olbia

History and Culture

Olbia, a city with many pages of history

Olbia is a small town on the coast in the north-east of Sardinia of great historical importance.
